meta.title: Form Rating
meta.description: BootstrapVue custom star rating form control for ratings entry or aggregated display.

props.description: CSS color to use instead of variant. Accepts either a HEX or RGB/RGBA string
Bootstrap Icon name to use for the clear button. Note icon must be registered in your component or globally
Bootstrap Icon name to use for the empty icon. Note icon must be registered in your component or globally
Bootstrap Icon name to use for the full icon. Note icon must be registered in your component or globally
Bootstrap Icon name to use for the half icon. Note icon must be registered in your component or globally
When `true` renders as an inline element rather than a blick (100% width) element
Locale (or locales) to use when showing the value when prop `show-value` is set. Defaults to the browser default locale
Specify the number of digits after the decimal to show. Defaults to to no defined precision
When `true` makes the rating readonly. When `true`, fractional ratings values are allowed (half icons will be shown)
When `true` shows the clear value icon button
When `true` shows the current rating value in the control
When set to `true` and prop `show-value` is `true`, includes the maximum star rating possible in the formatted value
The number of stars to show. Minimum value is `3`, default is `5`
Rating value. This is the v-model
Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

slots.name: icon-clear
slots.description: Content for the optional clear button

scope.description: Value of the `variant` prop, or `null` if disabled
Value of the `variant` prop, or `null` if disabled
Value of the `variant` prop, or `null` if disabled
